name: The Downfall of Lord Sweety
description:
Can you defeat the waves of chocolate and candy Lord Sweety will throw at you?

Will you defeat him once and for all?

Guide your toothpaste fighter with these keys:

Arrow keys to move, space to shoot!

This game was created in 3 days for the 2021 LÖVE Game Jam.  Programming, graphics and sound by arqitech.

I hope you enjoy it!

- arqitech
